story.headline: ROIMax Adopts Flexibility Strategy
story.summary: news.com assesses the strengths of the Connector release
story.content:
April 17, 2001 - ROIMax, Inc. (Nasdaq: ROI), this week detailed plans to increase the flexibility of its entire ROIMax Product Suite, a strategy analysts applaud as great step forward in this industry.
Cambridge, Mass.-based ROIMax said its flagship ROIMax Product and Connector will have increased flexibility by year's end. ROIMax will continue to work on expanding other feature sets, but the new strategy puts greater emphasis on this key point.
ROIMax's Product Suite include the ROIMax Product and Connector, functionality that allows businesses to manage relationships and target potential customers.
